introduction_text: You can register a college with us if you feel the college deserves to be a part of the Responsible Campus Awards. Please add relevant college details for us to review your registration and we will notify you about the approval status soon! Post-approval, the college will be available on this portal for voting.✨
name: college-registration
title: College Registration

web_form_fields.label: Why do you think Bhumi Awards Portal should register this college for voting?
